herosection.title: Everything your business needs in one place
herosection.subtitle: Optimize your business with innovative solutions.

cta.paragraph: Try Nimuu for free as long as you want.

featuresection.title: A world of unlocked potential, where achieving more becomes the new standard.

electronic_billing.title: Electronic Billing
electronic_billing.description_one: Simplify compliance with seamless electronic invoice management.
electronic_billing.description_two: Automate fiscal processes by integrating with tax authorities.
electronic_billing.description_three: Stay on top of your finances with invoice due date reminders.
electronic_billing.description_four: Effortlessly validate and process electronic receipts.

inventory_management.title: Inventory Management
inventory_management.description_one: Take full control of your inventory with intuitive management tools.
inventory_management.description_two: Automate restocking to keep your warehouse always ready.
inventory_management.description_three: Get real-time insights into your product performance and stock levels.

integrated_pos.title: Integrated POS
integrated_pos.description_one: Bridge your in-store and online sales seamlessly with a unified POS system.
integrated_pos.description_two: Offer fast, secure, and versatile payment options to your customers.
integrated_pos.description_three: Keep your inventory up to date with automatic synchronization

financial_reports.title: Financial Reports
financial_reports.description_one: Make data-driven decisions with detailed, real-time financial insights.
financial_reports.description_two: Save time with automated bank reconciliations.
financial_reports.description_three: Stay audit-ready with efficient fiscal compliance tools.

ecommerce_marketing.title: E-Commerce and Multichannel Marketing
ecommerce_marketing.description_one: Manage your online store effortlessly with integrated e-commerce tools.
ecommerce_marketing.description_two: Expand your reach by synchronizing with marketplaces and social platforms.
ecommerce_marketing.description_three: Drive growth with tailored, automated marketing campaigns.

payment_gateway.title: Payment Gateway
payment_gateway.description_one: Enable secure, fast, and flexible payments with ease.
payment_gateway.description_two: Offer diverse payment options, from credit cards to digital wallets.
payment_gateway.description_three: Streamline your transactions with trusted third-party integrations.

simplified_sales.title: Simplified Sales Consolidation
simplified_sales.paragraph: Facilitates the integration of sales from multiple points with centralized management.

monitor_sales.title: Monitor Sales and Customer Behavior
monitor_sales.paragraph: Generates detailed reports to improve business decisions and enhance the customer experience.

automate_streamline.title: Automate and Streamline Inventory Management
automate_streamline.paragraph: The system automates inventory updates and reports, saving time and reducing errors.

share_reports.title: Share Reports in Minutes
share_reports.paragraph: Quickly generate and distribute sales and inventory reports to keep your team informed efficiently.

subtitle_card.free_card: Ideal for entrepreneurs just starting out

plans_page.title: Plans tailored to your business
plans_page.subtitle: Scale your business with Nimuu
plans_page.partner_description: Need a custom solution for your large enterprise? Contact us to create a tailored plan.

texts.text1: I am extremely satisfied with the services provided. The team was responsive, professional, and delivered results that exceeded my expectations.
texts.text2: I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the outcome of our project. The creativity and problem-solving skills of the team were crucial in bringing our vision to life.
texts.text3: It was a pleasure working with this company. Their attention to detail and commitment to excellence are commendable. I would recommend them to anyone seeking top-quality service.
texts.text4: Working with this team was a game-changer for our project. Their attention to detail and innovative solutions helped us achieve our goals faster than expected. We are incredibly grateful for their professionalism and expertise!
texts.text5: I am amazed by the level of professionalism and dedication shown by the team. They surpassed our expectations and delivered exceptional results.
texts.text6: The team went above and beyond to ensure our project was a success. Their expertise and commitment are unmatched. I look forward to working with them again in the future.
